excerpt: "A study from IAM RoadSmart has revealed that 60 per cent of motorists consider the growing ability of vehicles to drive themselves as a serious threat to road safety. The UK Car accident While female drivers (66 per cent) and drivers over the age of 70 (64 per cent) had even higher concerns."
